== YuckyGooGoo-Baan == TRIGGER WARNING: VIOLENT CONTENT


Yuckygoogoo-Ban is an evil beast that lurks in the lower levels of the Banban Kindergarte
Contents

    1 Life
    2 Mascot
    3 Ingame
    4 Lore
    5 Experiment log 1
    6 Result logs 1
    7 Trivia

Life

Previously. in life his name was Brad P. Hawg, and he was a conviced serial killers with ties to the bad guys. (my mommy says I cant say them but they were the bad guys a). He lost his legs in a ATF raid and ithats how they found the bodies In his hosue. He was put on deathe rwo and he had 2 choices Die or become a banban. He chose to be a protptye first experiment for the mascots and he was one of the first scuessfull ones to be maked.

survived inside Iceberg twice, once after the american revolution, one after the industrial revolution. Emerged from underneath Waco Texas and joined the Branch Davidians as an missionairy
Mascot

Once he baceme a mascot he scaped into the vents but then the faiility caved in and he got stuck inside the vents. he looks so starved because hes in the vent

s and he hasnt eaten for weeks he is also an early epxoeriemnt so hes injured and needs an iv to live.

Hes angry because hes in Pain Always and he hurts and he attacks the player to eat them so he can get strcng. His is diseased with Tentaisnus and needs to go to surface dctor for cure

Designation Case 00X
Ingame

The player will encounter yuckygoogoo-ban in the vents. he has to avoid him or selse he will run at the player and kill them. In order to escape the vents the player has to destroy 5 buttins to open the vents and escape, him, and once they escape he will chase after the player but getst hit by a giant metal thing and it pins him in the wall so the player escaes Later on he comes back and ou have to stop him from finding the antidote to the disease tetantus (idk how to spell it sorry for bad english) hidden in monster cans, once he the player gets all the mosnters he dies of his disease
Lore
Experiment log 1

Brad: Are you srue this is going to work?"

Brad: Screams whole
